title: Better Auth
description: Better Auth is a modern authentication solution for your Next.js application.

content.text: Welcome to the documentation for Better Auth in Next.js. This guide will help you set up authentication quickly and securely.
To install Better Auth, you need to have Node.js and npm installed. You can download them from [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) and [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/get-npm).
To get started with Better Auth, you need to have Node.js and npm installed. You can download them from [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) and [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/get-npm).
